column5: Digital entrepreneurship is a fast-growing area of entrepreneurship. Our MSc Digital Entrepreneurship will help you with the latest skills to launch your own digital venture or join one.This program is practice-oriented, as it involves practical cases and real entrepreneurship projects with digital foundations. This program will give you an opportunity to learn how to apply a toolkit for digital entrepreneurship in practice. We will offer you an insight into how to use data analytics and data mining tools and the outputs they generate for decision making.
column7: For more information, please visit the programme page on our website.
column9: 1 year full-time, Up to 4 years part-time
